start.text: At the risk of sounding clichéd, we've been expecting you.
Awaiting orders. We'll do this by the book.

start_boss.text: Be advised, a high-threat battlegroup is inbound. Remain focused.
Well, well. It looks like we've got quite a challenge on our hands.

retreat.text: Retreating now. I do prefer fleeing to getting immolated.
Evacuating now, commander. I appreciate being allowed to disengage at all.

out_of_missiles.text: It seems we've run out of ammunition.
We're out of missiles. It may be time to adjust our tactics.

engaged.text: Engaging. Do make sure I'm covered.
Now, where is their armor softest..?
Preparing to engage. This will be easy.

need_help.text: Requesting assistance. In a timely manner, please.

pursuing.text: It seems they've finally figured out who they're up against.
My, my. These ones didn't have as much mettle as they thought.
We have the upper hand. Perfection.

running.text: I've overextended! If you'd excuse me for a short moment...
Apologies, but we need to step back for some time.

hull_90.text: That hurt nothing but my pride.

hull_50.text: We're in a sorry condition. We may want to retreat.
The situation is escalating. Are you sure we should continue, commander?
Integrity is down to 50 percent, requesting aid!

hull_30.text: Taking casualties! I- I don't want to be next!
We're barely avoiding going critical! Commander, we need to withdraw!
Oh, heavens! We're taking severe damage!

overload.text: Overload. We can't lose our composure.
That was too much for our capacitors. Do keep us covered for a moment.
Ah! Keep us safe, we seem to have overloaded.

death.text: I'm sorry to report... I'm no longer fit for duty...

victory.text: Well done, crew. I believe I've earned my paycheck with that one.
At the risk of sounding clichéd, nothing can stop us now.

victory_boss.text: I believe we've shown what we can do.
